ygData.subject: Re: Frustration Story (OT - Long)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That makes me ask something that was in my mind for some time now. Why we bards, Traveleurs of Norrah, that should move from city to city, telling our
ygData.messageBody:
>The difference between my story and yours? I was bound in Kelethin, and
>heading for Erudin. Death #1 = the exact same place you died, but Death #2
>was in Kithicor (thanks, Capt. Shralok!). That's when I decided to ask for
>a teleport.

That makes me ask something that was in my mind for some time now.
Why we bards, Traveleurs of Norrah, that should move from city to city,
telling our stories..
Why we don't have any binding song?? I particulary think it would
make sense,
Even if not bind forever, it could have binded a few days, instead i
have to buy, "or beg to buy" someone else bind !!!

[]'s Kel.

PS.: Sorry for the poor english..
